title: ShippingException
description: This object is used to set shipping exceptions for merchant SKUs

service_level.description:
If your delivery options are defined by service_level only then use this field

			#Logic

			This field should be used if you are defining your shipping options by service_level

			#Valid Values

			*Standard

			*Expedited
			
			*Scheduled
			
			*NextDay
			
			*SecondDay

shipping_carrier.description:
A shipping carrier, including all that carrier's shipping_methods e.g. UPS, FedEx, USPS.  Use this field if you want your change to apply to all shipping_methods of a given carrier.

			#Logic

			If 'shipping_carrier' is populated then 'shipping_method' will be ignored

			#Valid Values

			*the list of shipping_carriers set up by you
			
			*'All' - if the changes should apply to all of your shipping_carriers

shipping_method.description:
A specific shipping method e.g. UPS Ground, UPS Next Day Air, FedEx Home

			#Logic

			this should be used if you want the change to apply to a specific shipping_method.  If shipping_carrier is populated this field will be ignored

override_type.description:
The type of shipping override, "Additional Charge" or "Override Charge" (Override Charge could be used to lower shipping)

			#Valid Values

			*'Additonal Charge' - a charge that is added to the default shipping charge 

			*'Override Charge' - a charge that overrides the default shipping charge

shipping_charge_amount.description:
The amount added to default shipping when "OverrideType"= "additional charge" and the total amount charged when "OverrideType" =  "Override charge"

			#Logic

			This field is required if override_type is populated

is_shipping_restricted.description:
Indicates whether the MercantSKU can or cannot be shipped using the specified shipping service (shipping_carrier, shipping_method or service_level). A value of "true" means that the SKU cannot be shipped using the specified shipping service.

			#Logic
			You can only populate 'is_shipping_restricted' or 'is_shipping_exclusive'

is_shipping_exclusive.description:
Indicates that the MerchantSKU can ONLY be shipped with specified shipping service (shipping_carrier, shipping_method or service_level). A value of "true" means that the SKU can be shipped using ONLY the specified shipping service.

			#Logic
			You can only populate 'is_shipping_restricted' or 'is_shipping_exclusive'
